title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Experimental aircraft - max speed
description:
In this video we will look at how to reach the max speed of the experimental aircraft which is part of the free Top Gun Maverick addon for MSFS 2020 which has been released earlier today. I will show you some tips which helped me reaching the max speed because initially I also had some challenges reaching it ;-)
